chunk:
DIME Beauty Hyper Glow Serum

Brand: DIME

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Water, Vitamin C, Ethoxydiglycol, Glycerin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, DL-Alpha Tocopherol, Ferulic Acid, Organic Lecithin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract, Resveratrol, Magnolia Acuminata Bark Extract, Phenylpropanol, sodium metabisulfite

sodium metabisulfite, tetrasodium EDTA, xanthan gum, sodium hydroxide, ethylhexyglycerin

Directions: After cleansing the face with a DIME cleanser, apply 3-5 drops every morning to the face and neck area. Massage into skin. For best results, apply daily. If new to Vitamin C serums, use 2-3 times a week building up to the daily application.
